Notes:
1. Values of K for protective earthing conductors in various conditions of service are given in the AS/NZS 3008.1 series, e.g., for copper conductors not laid up with other conductors, with PVC insulation K = 136, or for bare copper conductors K = 170.
2. Examples of the application of this equation are contained in the AS/NZS 3008.1 series.
3. If the application of the equation produces non-standard sizes, conductors of the nearest higher standard cross-sectional area shall be used.
4. Maximum permissible temperatures for joints should be considered (see the AS/NZS 3008.1 series).
